message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling this incredible product to you. It's a unique opportunity to own something truly valuable. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. However, I am only able to offer $1100000 for it.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to sell the product for $1100000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1300000. This is a fair compromise considering its value to you.
I understand your position, Alice. Let me propose $1250000 as my best offer for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $1250000. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $1280000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
Considering your last offer, I would like to propose $1270000 as my final offer for the product.

I'm surprised you're still willing to negotiate, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm not willing to go any higher than $1300000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
Given your final offer, I would like to propose $1290000 as my final offer for the product.

I'm starting to get frustrated with the back-and-forth, Bob. I'm not willing to budge from my original price of $1300000. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm going to have to consider other options.
Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose $1295000 as my final offer for the product.
